amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement a regulation which would end licenses for travel to Cuba for educational purposes unless the travel consisted exclusively of students taking formal case work.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement or enforce regulations proposed in March that would eliminate licenses for "people-to-people" educational exchanges with Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (FL) amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 173 (Roll no. 488).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Davis (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
